Class RobotSchedular

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • RobotSchedular
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRemoteObject, ISchedular, Serializable, Remote
    public class RobotSchedular
extends UnicastRemoteObject
implements ISchedular, Serializable, IRemoteObject
    Utility Class to execute functions on robot System, Store Scheduled List of Jobs for robot, return list of scheduled jobs to UI client.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Aneel Ahmed
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
